meanings.definition: The quality or state of being subjective.
meanings.sent1: Her subjectivenesses influenced her opinions greatly.
meanings.sent2: The subjectivenesses of art make it open to interpretation.
meanings.sent3: His subjectivenesses about ice cream flavors always lead to interesting debates.
meanings.sent4: The subjectivenesses of color perception can vary from person to person.
meanings.sent5: The subjectivenesses of beauty are evident in different cultural standards.

meanings.definition: The subjective aspects or qualities of something.
meanings.sent1: The subjectivenesses of the painting made it unique.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the subjectivenesses of the book's characters.
meanings.sent3: The subjectivenesses of the weather forecast made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The subjectivenesses of music can evoke strong emotions.
meanings.sent5: His writing beautifully captured the subjectivenesses of human emotions.
